title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: April 16, 2023, 02:20:40 PMLast edit: April 17, 2023, 12:02:23 PM by cafter
content: I Will Convert Graphical Images To BBcode Block Images, "Humanly Made"Hello,Here are many Avatar/Signature/Graphic designers are working on this forum, and they also receive projects to design signatures, while designing signatures, a lot of time goes in writing bbcode for a image. so to save your time and make some bitcoin, i am introducing my service of converting simple graphical image to bbcode image which will save a ton of time for you. I will Convert any type of image to bbcode image (The image should not be very very complicated), My service is not only for signature designers also for user who wants to give there profile a fancy look by adding some bbcode made images. if you don't know what is a bbcode images then here a example. bbcode images made from small blocks or characters.░░░░░░░░████████░░░░░░░░███░░░░░░░░████████████████░░████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░██████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░██████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████████░░░░░░░░░░████████████████████████░░░░░░░░████████████████████████░░░░░░░░████████████████████████░░░░░░░░████████████████████████░░░░░░░░░░████████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░█████████░░░░░░░░░░██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████Code:[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░[color=green]████████[/color]░░░░░░░[color=brown]░███[/color][color=transparent]░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░[color=green]████████████████[/color]░░[color=brown]████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░[color=green]████████████[/color][color=brown]██[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░[color=green]██████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░░░░░[color=orange]██[/color][color=orange]██████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████████████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████████████[/color][color=transparent]░░░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████████████████[/color][color=transparent]░░[color=transparent]░░░░░░[color=orange]████████████████████████[/color][color=tran am new to this service and don't have portfolio so, I will first design the bbcode image for the project then show to you if you like or not, it is just for saving time for a designer.Price range without color: $15-$20/Img    | Price range with color: $20I will complete your project in maximum of 2days.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I am not a signature designer, but I tried to design a signature for this free campaign  <free> Bisq Market Day - March 20th 2023 signature/avatar, and since I do not have a budget, I searched on the Internet and found that there are services that convert images into BBcode and the service that I used is https://asciiart.clubThe second problem that I noticed is the number of characters allowed, which is less than 4000, which makes the design of the signature be as one unit (one designer)  and not as disjointed parts due to the limited number of characters.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: I believe you have a good service to render, because going through your work showed that many company will enjoy your service like other potential designer. With this price you indicate on your work will make people to believe that you know what you are doing and you have something good to offer.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 16, 2023, 02:20:40 PMsample of image from signatures that i found here:You shouldn't use other people's work to promote your thread.QuoteI am new to this service and don't have portfolio soLol. You could at least show you can do it by creating an example of your own.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 16, 2023, 02:20:40 PMI am new to this service and don't have portfolio so, I will first design the bbcode image for the project then show to you if you like or not, it is just for saving time for a designer.Undoubtedly it is a good service if you can do it perfectly. But to show you can do it perfectly you should have provided a sample of what you have to do. You could post a few samples without any order and you could post them here. Which could prove your expertise of you. I think you will do that asap. Have a good journey in your design career.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: @cafter, this is a good service you are pushing for here.  You have a nice idea of saving much time while using fastest means of achieving your target. I would advise you to do some samples rather than showcasing the signature bbcode  belonging to another project. Design your own, use it as sample, wear it to advertise your services yourself. It will serve as your portfolio of work you have done. This would help market your services.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 16, 2023, 02:20:40 PMif you don't know what is a bbcode images then here a example. bbcode images made from small blocks or characters.sample of image from signatures that i found here: .......I am new to this service and don't have portfolio so, I will first design the bbcode image for the project then show to you if you like or not, it is just for saving time for a designer.You're not a professional, you know that professionals do not use other people's work or at least you'll give them credit after you ask them permission to use their work.If you don't have a portfolio yet then create your own sample or do a free design so you people can vouch for how good your service is.There are good designers here you should offer a better and more competitive price for someone who is just starting out.

comments.author: lucifur
comments.body: As someone already mentioned above, there is a character limit that you can use in the signature so it'll be easier for the designer to create the bbcodes by theirselves because they can track the numbers of characters that they are using when designing. It will be an additional work to have someone design some part of it then readjust everything.I know you mean well but I don't think anyone would be using this service. All signature designers I see here can do their own bbcode images.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 16, 2023, 04:33:09 PMjust a mistakeOnce again, I am not a signature designer. However, I managed to reduce the number of words that the Facebook image has, as I replaced:There is no need for a word color at the beginning of each lineWhite word consumes a lot of letters, so #FFF takes four words and not 5 words.Total number = 701your total number = 909SAME RESULTS ///Thus, its mission is the developer of signatures, giving the best result in the limits of 4000 words, and therefore it must be one designer.Try to develop skills and present yourself as a signature designer, non-signed parts design is easier than image design.Quote██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████Code:[color=#00f]██████████████████████████████████████[color=#fff]██████████[color=#00f]███████████████[color=#fff]████████████[color=#00f]██████████████[color=#fff]████████████[color=#00f]██████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████[color=#fff]████████████████[color=#00f]██████████[color=#fff]████████████████[color=#00f]██████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]████████████████████[color=#fff]██████[color=#00f]█████████

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: you are right i will make another thread if only signature design, but i will get orders? as a intermediate?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 17, 2023, 12:43:45 PMyou are right i will make another thread if only signature design, but i will get orders? as a intermediate?Start free offers for the first 3 clients and then the price of $ 5, $ 10 to an average of 30 dollars.Try to develop your skills before providing your service, copy the previous signature codes, adjust them and learn from them, within a month or two, the design will be professional.It is a cumulative issue, there are two active designers, and therefore the competitor is not great.
